name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East: The German-Soviet War 1941-1945
name_original: Gary Grigsby's War in the East: The German-Soviet War 1941-1945
description:
Gary Grigsby's War in the East: The German-Soviet War 1941-1945 is a strategy game developed by 2by3 Games. It came out on 07-12-2010. It was published by Matrix Games.
You can play Gary Grigsby's War in the East: The German-Soviet War 1941-1945 on PC.
